item.title: Runescapes new Dragons (INCLUDING KBD)
item.dc:creator: @johnw1 johnw1
item.description:
@johnw1 wrote:

I dont know if its been done but here goes…

These are runescapes new dragons models. A tiny bit gltiched with walking animations but sooo much better looking than before.

Models Here:

http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/11/21/2195413/dragons.rar

Here are the ints to put into your class5.java (non-renamed)

[CODE] if(i == 50)
{
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
class5.aString65 = “King Black Dragon”;
class5.anInt61 = 276;
class5.aByteArray89 = “A fierce dragon with black scales.”.getBytes();
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[6];
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9063;
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9064;
class5.anIntArray94[2] = 9065;
class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9066;
class5.anIntArray94[4] = 9067;
class5.anIntArray94[5] = 9068;
}
if(i == 54)
{
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
byte byte8 = 6;
class5.anIntArray76 = new int[byte8];
class5.anIntArray70 = new int[byte8];
class5.anIntArray76[0] = 2469;
class5.anIntArray70[0] = 20;
class5.anIntArray76[1] = 2588;
class5.anIntArray70[1] = 15;
class5.anIntArray76[2] = 910;
class5.anIntArray70[2] = 3;
class5.anIntArray76[3] = 912;
class5.anIntArray70[3] = 5;
class5.anIntArray76[4] = 1938;
class5.anIntArray70[4] = 7;
class5.anIntArray76[5] = 1814;
class5.anIntArray70[5] = 10;
class5.aString65 = “Black Dragon”;
class5.anInt61 = 227;
class5.aByteArray89 = “A fierce dragon with black scales!”.getBytes();
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4];
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9422;
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9673;
class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10005;
class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9671;
}
if(i == 55)
{
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
byte byte9 = 6;
class5.anIntArray76 = new int[byte9];
class5.anIntArray70 = new int[byte9];
class5.anIntArray76[0] = 2469;
class5.anIntArray70[0] = 43940;
class5.anIntArray76[1] = 2588;
class5.anIntArray70[1] = 43935;
class5.anIntArray76[2] = 910;
class5.anIntArray70[2] = 43915;
class5.anIntArray76[3] = 912;
class5.anIntArray70[3] = 43920;
class5.anIntArray76[4] = 1938;
class5.anIntArray70[4] = 43925;
class5.anIntArray76[5] = 1814;
class5.anIntArray70[5] = 43930;
class5.aString65 = “Blue Dragon”;
class5.anInt61 = 111;
class5.aByteArray89 = “A mother dragon.”.getBytes();
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4];
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9422;
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9673;
class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10005;
class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9671;
}
if(i == 53)
{
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
class5.aString65 = “Red Dragon”;
class5.anInt61 = 152;
class5.aByteArray89 = “A big powerful dragon.”.getBytes();
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4];
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9422;
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9673;
class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10005;
class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9671;
}

    if(i == 941)
    {
        aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
        class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
        class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
        class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
        class5.aString65 = "Green Dragon";
        class5.anInt61 = 79;
        class5.aByteArray89 = "Must be related to Elvarg.".getBytes();
        class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4];
        class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10006;
        class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10007;
        class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10008;
        class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9671;
    }

[/CODE]

Now add you models to your client by copying the .gz files into your “Models” folder.
You then need to type in-game (unless you have preloading):

add model 9422
add model 9671
add model 9673
add model 10005
add model 10006
add model 10007
add model 10008

Make sure you type them as you see it there ^ without any ::

Pictures.

]

Hope you like them
